title: Emerald and Diamond Floral Jadau Necklace - Panchala Haaram
features: Intricate Jadau setting showcasing floral motifs adorned with brilliant cut diamonds. Features alternating floral and paisley designs along the necklace line. Central emerald cabochons are placed within diamond halos, cascading down to a larger floral pendant. Dangles with delicate gold balls enhance the traditional allure. Features exceptional craftsmanship, representing the finest Hyderabadi artistry.
occasions: or grand festivals. Also suitable for high-end parties and cultural events.
description: A timeless piece that perfectly blends the opulence of diamonds with the vibrancy of emeralds. The Jadau setting demonstrates superior craftsmanship and artistry, offering a valuable heirloom for generations to come. The floral design is a symbol of prosperity and new beginnings, adding to its sentimental value.
